posts.post_content:
Selling off some T206's to make room for new stuff. "I'll take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.

All prices include shipping. PPFF preferred.

Rube Kroh Blank Back SGC A - $old
Mickey Doolan (Batting) - EPDG SGC 30 - $old
George Davis HOF Sweet Caporal 350/F25 SGC 30 - $old
Bill Clymer - Sweet Caporal 350/F30 PSA 4 - $old

Please PM if interested.


Thanks for looking!

Doolan sold


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Will take the Clymer for $100.00 - will message you - thanks!
